lead_paragraph: KORNFELD--Jeffrey, age 60 of Westport, CT, formerly of Bayside, NY, passed away peacefully on April 14, 2016. Devoted son of the late Frieda and Daniel Kornfeld, beloved husband of Sue Joustra, adored father of Alexandra and Logan Kornfeld and treasured bonus dad to Samantha Joustra, cherished brother of Rochelle Tivin, uncle to Kimberly Silversmith (David), Michael Tivin and Jillian Tivin, and great-uncle to Brynn Silversmith. Jeff was loved by all and will be truly missed. Services will take place on Sunday, April 17, 2016 at 10:00am at the Abraham L. Green and Son Funeral Home, 88 Beach Rd., Fairfield, CT, with Interment following at the Wellwood Cemetery, NY. Memorial contributions may be made to Regional Hospice and Home Care, Danbury, CT. 1/3
